hero.title: Welcome,
hero.text: I am Ramon, a product designer from Barcelona currently working with Red Bull and teaching design at SketchCasts. In the past, I’ve worked for clients such as Varner and Intersport.

story.title: story
story.text: Ramon Gilabert is a product designer with a lot of passion for user interaction and visual design. He has a strong interest in rapidly prototyping ideas and experience in front end and iOS development. Right now, he is looking for his next role as a product designer.
